root.name: Bone: Out from Boneville
root.description: OverviewBased on the first volume of Jeff Smith's comic book series, Bone: Out From Boneville is a classic point and click adventure game following the storyline of the original comics. When thrown out of their hometown, Boneville, Fone Bone and his two cousins Phoney Bone and Smiley Bone find themselves with only a mysterious map to guide them through the desert. Things take a turn for the worst as Smiley gets separated from the others when a swarm of locusts descends upon the trio. During their quest to save Smiley, Fone and Phoney meet many of the characters of the comic ranging from: the lovely Thorn, Gran'ma Benm, the enigmatic Red Dragon, tiny Ted, and the 'possum kids.PC System RequirementsOS: Windows XP or VistaProcessor: 1.5GHz processorMemory: 256MB RAMGraphics: 32MB 3D-accelerated video card
